episodes.title: Inside Church Of England’s Biggest Abuse Scandal | See No Evil | Channel 4 Documentaries
episodes.description:
Contains discussions of abuse and suicide that some viewers may find upsetting.

A forensic exploration of the sinister world and psychology of prolific abuser John Smyth, and the biggest scandal in Church of England history. Featuring never-seen-before interviews.

Smyth launches a covert and brutal regime of abuse in the 1980s in Winchester. How did he weaponise faith? And how did his actions impact on others? (EP1 of 2)

First shown: 10 Dec 2025

SUBSCRIBE: https://www.youtube.com/c/Channel4Documentaries?sub_confirmation=1

episodes.title: I Went Undercover In The Far Right In Britain | Undercover: Exposing The Far Right | Channel 4 Docs
episodes.description:
Contains very strong and discriminatory language including racist terms.

An explosive look at the racist ideology and media-savvy tactics of the modern far right - featuring secret investigations by the anti-fascist group Hope not Hate.

First shown: 21 Oct 2024

01:54 Hidden cameras and going undercover

1:10:48 Violence and requests

episodes.title: I Was Hired By P Diddy: Insider Rapper Allegations Revealed | UNTOLD | Channel 4 Documentaries
episodes.description:
Contains very strong and offensive language, nudity, violent scenes and references to sexual assault.

As Diddy finally faces a trial for alleged sex crimes, we meet those closest to him to ask why the allegations remained hidden for so long and why it took decades for alleged victims to come forward. (S6 EP1)

First shown: 10 May 2025

episodes.title: Marilyn Manson: Inside The Abuse Allegations | Manson Unmasked | Channel 4 Documentaries
episodes.description:
With strong language, references to suicide and sexual abuse, and scenes that some viewers might find offensive.

In 2021, Marilyn Manson was accused of sexual assault. This deep dig into the allegations examines the wider context of the rock singer's meteoric rise and his dramatic fall. As more women accuse Manson of misconduct, the court cases stack up. The rock star's allies cry conspiracy. But others ask how much did the music industry know, and when? (EP3 of 3)

First shown: 14 Jan 2025

Watch episodes 1 and 2 here: https://www.channel4.com/programmes/marilyn-manson-unmasked

SUBSCRIBE: https://www.youtube.com/c/Channel4Documentaries?sub_confirmation=1
 
About #4Docs:
Welcome to Channel 4 Documentaries; the home of cutting-edge factual content, from the award-winning 24 Hours in A&E and Police Custody to provocative and powerful original true stories. Our True Crime series bring you mind-blowing tales of real crimes and unbelievable murder cases, and the investigative Untold and Dispatches delve into current affairs. 

Join the detectives piecing together the clues and pursuing criminals at every corner, see stories of life, love, and loss unfold in some of Britain’s busiest A&E departments, explore social injustice with Kathy Burke, and even more!

episodes.title: The Dark Side of Modelling: Uncovered - Paid To Party | In Too Deep
episodes.description:
Vulnerable young women are taking ‘modelling’ jobs which are sometimes more than they first appear. Model and journalist Sydney Lima immerses herself in the murky world of image modelling, built on grey areas and blurred lines, in a bid to uncover what happens to those who find themselves caught in its grasp.

Presented by: Sydney Lima
Production company: Flying Shoe Films & Meldrum Dent

00:00 Intro
01:00 The rise of image modelling or 'yachting'
03:13 Models speak out
04:58 Agencies exposed
11:12 Illegal under UK law
12:52 Anonymous model speaks out
16:11 The truth about the agencies

SUBSCRIBE: https://www.youtube.com/c/Channel4Documentaries?sub_confirmation=1

episodes.title: Escaping My Dad’s Cult After 30 Years Of Fear | Outsmarting | Channel 4
episodes.description:
Katy escaped her life of fear and paranoia at the age of 30, managing to outsmart the cult in 5 steps, and setting off a chain of events that saw her father Aravindan Balakrishnan jailed for 23 years. 

Now, forensic psychiatrist Dr Sohom Das profiles her father and tries to make sense of his terrifying behaviour, as well as reacting to and dissecting the events that led to Katy’s brave escape.  

00:00 "If we left the house we would die"
01:37 Profile of a cult leader
03:45 Gaslighted by Dad
05:24 How I outsmarted the cult
07:06 Stashing cash to escape
08:54 "I felt vindicated..."

SUBSCRIBE: https://www.youtube.com/c/Channel4Documentaries?sub_confirmation=1
